name: The Gatherer
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character.

v0.1.0-v0.1.4
- (v0.1.0)First release with 57 cards, 4 relics
- (v0.1.1)Fixed Light! having incorrect Block value during combat.
- (v0.1.2)Fixed Rusty Pipe not upgrading.
- (v0.1.2)Fixed Shadow! not dealing double damage after using Light!.
- (v0.1.2)Fixed Flower Power going up to 3 cost when fully upgraded. It now costs 1.
 (v0.1.3)Buffed Rusty Pipe's damage by 1.
- (v0.1.3)Tooltips were added to Magic Lamp and Flaming Bottle.
- (v0.1.3)Changed some texts slightly.
- (v0.1.4)Fix bug where the game softlock when you got Alchemy Bag as other characters.

v0.1.5
- Changed Rusty Pipe's wording to clarify it's effect.
